nodes.bodyText: nit: I noticed this in the previous PR too. What does widgetToInfo mean? I can understand groupToWidgets as a map. If its a map of widget information may be just widgetInfo?
widgetToInfo is a map of widget information. It maps widgetID to {widgetCategory: '', name: '', label: '', widgetType: ''}. I renamed it as widgetInfo!
